alert.note: Alert for Ottawa; Sandusky (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 10:55AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ottawa and Sandusky Counties through NOON EDT... At 1055 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rossford to Arcadia. Movement was northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fremont, Port Clinton, Bellevue, Clyde, Oak Harbor, Gibsonburg, Genoa, Woodville, Elmore, Green Springs, Ballville, Marblehead, Bettsville, Risingsun, Lindsey, Rocky Ridge, Clay Center, Helena, Burgoon and Stony Prairie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong wind gusts in excess of 50 mph will continue even after the rain exits.
